entry.title: FindTruman is selected as Excellence Award Winner of NEO Polaris Launchpad Hackathon
entry.content: FindTruman stood out in nearly 600 qualifying event registrants of 2022 NEO Polaris Launchpad Hackathon, and wins the Excellence Award after the judges carefully reviewed and evaluated. Totally, 14 project entries have been selected as Polaris Launchpad Excellence Award Winners. Each winning project will receive $8000 in NEO tokens. The winning project teams will also receive customized consultation time with the NGD EcoGrowth team. We are thankful to Neo for hosting this wonderful event and we are appreciative of the judges for bestowing this honor and trust on¬†us.FindTruman are expected to join in the NEO Global Development EcoBoost program and build a better blockchain industry with NEO together. NEO is a very mature mainstream public chain with an ecological development that has been growing until now, and the new technical architecture N3 is very friendly to support various projects and products related to the ‚Äúsmart economy‚Äù. NEO can keep the gas at a relatively low level while keeping a decentralized model and the interactions can be done rather fluently. These are very important characteristics for Dapp builders like FindTruman. The interactions can be done rather fluently, and they are very important characteristics for Dapp builders like FindTruman. With the NEO community‚Äôs huge potential in technical innovation and Dapp development, we have the same goal of developing the Web3 ecosystem based on the NEO blockchain. We shall continue to endeavor to develop the FindTruman Co-Creation platform.Learn more: https://devpost.com/software/findtrumanAbout NEONEO is an open-source community-driven blockchain platform established in 2014. It is the most feature-complete blockchain platform for building decentralized applications. NEO enables developers to digitize and automate the management of assets through smart contracts. It also provides powerful native infrastructures such as decentralized storage, oracles, and domain name service, creating a solid foundation for the Next-Gen Internet.üåê Web https://www.neo.orgüê¶ Twitter https://twitter.com/Neo_BlockchainAbout FindTrumanFindTruman is the First Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse. On FindTruman platform, you could experience the joy of story-gameplay, the reward of content co-creation and the potential airdrops of story NFTs. Players can join the co-creation procedure of the story and IP, and with the commercialization of this story into 3D scenarios in various web3 metaverse, or a transformation of these stories/IPs into web2 games can be initiated. FTG (FindTruman Genesis NFT) holders can share the governance right for DAO, get staking rewards, initiate new episodes or co-creation projects, get priority access for all activities and get potential airdrop rewards from FindTruman platform.üåê Web https://findtruman.ioüí¨ Discord https://discord.gg/TkNaeMJa2Cüê¶ Twitter https://twitter.com/FindTrumanüìñ Medium https://medium.com/@FindTruman

entry.title: FindTruman Has Formed A Collaboration With Polygon Studios
entry.content: FindTruman is excited to announce its collaboration with Polygon Studios. Considering that Polygon Studios partners with large-scale NFT projects for world-renowned IP and Brands, this collaboration is a strong sign of global recognition for FindTruman. Polygon Studios will back FindTruman up in further steps of scaling the project globally by sharing their ecosystem.About Polygon StudiosüîéPolygon Studios aims to be the home of the most popular blockchain projects in the world. The Polygon Studios team is focused on supporting developers building decentralized apps on Polygon by providing Web2 and Web3 teams with a suite of services such as developer support, collaboration, strategy, go-to-market, and technical integrations. Polygon Studios supports projects from OpenSea to Prada, from Adidas to Draft Kings and Decentral Games to¬†Ubisoft.Twitter | Facebook | Instagram | Telegram | Tiktok |¬†LinkedInWhy The Collaboration Mattersü§îBy partnering with Polygon Studios, the company that is the best in class solution for energy efficiency and scaling on the blockchain, FindTruman players are provided with fast transaction speed and lower fees, and will help FindTruman expand the global network by merging with Polygon‚Äôs ecosystem.FindTruman player‚Äôs assets and achievements, including FindTruman POAP, Detective Badges and FTG parts are all built in Polygon, and well-received by our players. (1) FindTruman POAP is a sign of all FindTruman newcomers. We made a real-time story live show on Twitter. Players can vote by using FindTruman POAP to decide the direction story-lines in a decentralized Web3 way. (2) FindTruman Detective Badges are the sign of our community members‚Äô achievements and honors, e.g. for writers and creators, they will get owner-principal badges after co-creating stories according to their ideas, and we will build 3D scenes for their best stories. For all players, they can get case-solving badges after they can discuss the clues together with friends to find out the truth. (3) FindTruman divide the FTG (FindTruman Genesis NFT) into six layers. Each layer is a part of FTG. All FTG Parts are built on Polygon. Players can get a random FTG parts after finishing blind box¬†tasks.Till now, among FindTruman players‚Äô assets, 2380 FindTruman POAPs with unique address, 4472 FTG Parts corresponding to 1092 addresses and 705 FindTruman Badges corresponding to 329 addresses are all minted on Polygon, and greatly enhance the enthusiasm of players‚Äô participation.Polygon Studios has shown further interest in FindTruman and offered marketing and tech support. This is just the beginning of the relationship, so both parties are looking into continuing to grow together, which would enable us to craft more opportunities to strengthen our ecosystems.What Is FindTruman‚ùìFindTruman is the First Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse. On FindTruman platform, you could experience the joy of story-gameplay, the reward of content co-creation and the potential airdrops of story NFTs. Players can join the co-creation procedure of the story and IP, and with the commercialization of this story into 3D scenarios in various web3 metaverse, or a transformation of these stories/IPs into web2 games can be initiated. Players with FTG (FindTruman Genesis NFT) can share the governance right for DAO, get staking rewards, initiate new episodes or co-creation projects, get priority access for all activities and get potential airdrop rewards from FindTruman platform.üåê Web https://findtruman.io üí¨ Discord https://discord.gg/TkNaeMJa2C üê¶ Twitter https://twitter.com/FindTruman üìñ Medium https://medium.com/@FindTruman

entry.title: FTG(FindTruman Genesis NFT) FREE MINT will be closed on Mar.27th, 2022!
entry.content: FTG(FindTruman Genesis NFT) FREE MINT will be closed on Mar.31st, 2022!Welcome to FindTruman‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää‚Äî The FIRST Alternate Reality Game in metaverse!Our FTG(FindTruman Genesis NFT) FREE MINT will be closed on Mar.31st, 2022!For those who want to get FTG FREE MINT, please hurry¬†up!‚ú® Method 1. Do tasks! Open Blind Boxes! [Will be closed at 18:00(UTC+8), Mar.31st, 2022]Find tasks in #blind-box-tasks Discord channel or https://findtruman.io/#/assets. Then, you will have the rights to open a blind box after completing each task. Each blind box contain one body part of FTG. Merge your unique FTG after collecting all types of body¬†parts.üëâMore details: https://findtruman.io/#/assets (Blind Boxes & parts module on right¬†side).‚ú®Method 2. Participate in FindTruman Alpha Test! Be top detective![Will be closed at 18:00(UTC+8), Mar.31st, 2022]Participate in FindTruman Alpha Test. üëâMore details: https://twitter.com/FindTruman/status/1505508818259640322Then, go to: https://findtruman.io/#/participate. Submit your SEVEN DEADLY SINS reasoning report in ‚ÄúCritical‚Äù Module¬†.10 FTG FREE MINT for the Top 10 reasoning reports!üö´Method 3. Invite friends! Co-create communities! [Closed at 22:00(UTC+8), Feb.28th, 2022]üëâFollow us in these channels:üîπ Official website: https://findtruman.ioüîπ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FindTrumanüîπ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/vrUjMWsjAjüîπ Medium: https://medium.com/@FindTruman

entry.title: Replay of live content with MaskNetwork
entry.content: Will (Co-founder & CEO of FindTruman) and Bing ( Co-founder & CMO of FindTruman) were guests in the MaskNetwork Live room, and got enthusiastic responses and communications from audience!The replay of live content are as¬†follows:Host: Today we have Will and Bing from FindTruman presenting in our AMA, could you guys give a brief self-introduction to everyone.Will: Hello, this is Will. I‚Äôm the Co-founder and CEO of FindTruman.Bing: Hi, this is Bing. I‚Äôm the Co-founder and CMO of FindTruman. Nice to be¬†here.Host: Welcome guys. The topic of this AMA is ‚ÄúFindTruman‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäThe First Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse‚Äù, so can you explain to us ‚Äúwhat is Alternate Reality Game‚Äù, and ‚Äúwhat is FindTruman‚Äù.Bing:‚ÄúAlternate Reality Game‚Äù is a game form that blurs the lines between reality and fiction by conveying a hybrid gaming experience through online-offline mechanisms.All participants collaboratively look for clues, organize scattered information and solve puzzles to promote the plot development that combines both real and virtual environments.FindTruman is an Alternate Reality Game, and it is the FIRST Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse by using NFT as the bridge connecting the real and virtual¬†world.Host: Interesting. So, how does the whole FindTruman thing carry¬†on?Bing:In brief, the whole story of FindTruman will be shown on Twitter. The characters of FindTruman are ordinary people like us, and they post tweets every day. They are linked together by a mysterious incident. While, the mastermind of this incident is¬†TRUMAN.The unbeknown relationships, the undisclosed secrets, are all hidden in the characters‚Äô tweets. All the players collaboratively look for clues, organize scattered information and solve puzzles to promote the plot development.What makes FindTruman special is, the players could determine the direction of the plot by NFT-based voting.By using FTG (FindTruman Genesis NFT), the players will have the supreme right to decide the others‚Äô fate. The decision will change the characters‚Äô every action. The decision may make TRUMAN give the show¬†away.If the players find out TRUMAN, they will obtain the Genesis Prize. OR TRUMAN escapes and¬†wins.Host: Terrific! So, I‚Äôm curious about what brings you the idea about FindTruman?Will:In fact, I was one of the first people to do Chinese LARP (Live Action Role Play) game, which is also a form of gaming with social¬†content.I created a Chinese LARP brand in 2017. Until now, we have 30+ Million registered users in our APP. 90% of the users are 14‚Äì35 years old. And we have 50+ live-action studios around China. What‚Äôs more, we have 1500+ authors in contract, and 20k+ story copyrights. We have good experience in content social¬†gaming.In my point of view, web3 would bring new opportunities for content creation and social entertainment. So, from May 2021, I started to form a new team and plan a new project, a crypto native brand‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäFindTruman.FindTruman is a series campaign, and contains many seasons. Moreover, FindTruman is our first ARG story, and more stories are coming¬†soon.Host: That‚Äôs great. Just now, you talk about the NFT in FindTruman, called FTG. Could you explain more about FTG, what‚Äôs the value of¬†FTG?Bing:FTG represents FindTruman Genesis NFT. It is the core asset of FindTruman world.It is minted on Ethereum. The total number of FTG is 5000. The minting price is¬†0.08eth.FTG is a PERMANENT ticket for the FindTruman series, including: participating in the future campaigns, voting, interaction, solving puzzles, changing others‚Äô lives, and having the chance to win the Genesis¬†Prize.What‚Äôs more, FTG represents Truman DAO‚Äôs membership which shares the future governance rights.By the way, we invited a famous crypto artist to design the FTG image. FTG is worth collecting. You can preview the FTG by watching a short¬†video.https://medium.com/media/0f41d1c6487ea77fac4f9af4b8cb9ccc/hrefHost: It‚Äôs really cool. How to mint¬†FTG?Bing:The total number of FTG is¬†5000.500 is free minted for our VIP Players, including: early adopters, cooperative communities, etc.4500 is for public sales (among them, 2500 will be allocated for Whitelist minting).FTG minting will start from mid-to-late March.Host: Great, we will keep an eye on it. So, when will the game¬†start?Bing:FindTruman is a series of games containing many seasons. Currently, we are on the stage of FindTruman Alpha¬†Test.The story of Alpha Test will take place from 12:00 (UTC) to 14:00 (UTC) on March 18th, 19th,¬†20th.In this Alpha Test, you can experience all the gameplay of FindTruman in¬†advance.And, you will get a FTG whitelist if you participate in the Alpha¬†Test.Host: All right. Could you explain how to join the FindTruman Alpha Test in¬†detail?Bing:Of course.For participating FindTruman Alpha¬†Test:1) Participate plot voting from 12:00 (UTC) to 14:00 (UTC) of March 18th, 19th,¬†20th.2) Get daily Detective Badges.3) Exchange Detective Badges for FindTruman WL.We also invite network anchors to live stream the entire game process of FindTruman Alpha¬†Test.Welcome to join our discord to get timely¬†news:https://discord.com/invite/vrUjMWsjAjHost: Just now, you mentioned ‚ÄúNFT-based voting‚Äù, how does it¬†work?Bing:The FindTruman voting process is quite similar to Snapshot voting. The different point is, FindTruman voting mechanism is based-on NFT instead of ERC20¬†token.All voting results of FindTruman are decentralized and traceable, and belong to the individuals completely.There are two ways to¬†vote.The first one: You can go to our website: https://findtruman.io/#/participateThe second one: You can find the FindTruman application on Mask Network. The vote can be executed in the FindTruman application on Mask¬†Network.As shown above, on Mask Network, there is an entrance leading directly to FindTruman space.This could support participants seamlessly entering into FindTruman space without leaving their familiar Web 2.0 social networks. All the functions, including voting, asset querying, could be operated in FindTruman application on Mask¬†Network.Host: Great. In your point of view, what is the most innovative point of FindTruman?Bing:Currently, most projects employ 2D or 3D games to build the metaverse. This requires a very high cost and a lot of time. However, FindTruman creates a way to build the metaverse through textual expression and user interaction.We can look back at the history of the game‚Äôs development. The early games used words to build a world view, and gradually created a game masterpiece with a strong sense of immersion through 2D and 3D. Many online novels have finally been made into great movies and animations. Writing is very important. Words give us limitless possibilities. Through words, the cornerstone of consensus can be established. This consensus will serve as the foundation for the entire subsequent metaverse.We are now in the early stage of Web3. Like the early days of the internet, there are a lot of things needed to be built. Some people want to do it all in one step, go straight to a three-dimensional world, use blockchain as the underlying technology, add AR/VR into it, and develop a more modern metaverse. That‚Äôs great. But in our point of view, in the current stage, Web3 native applications need to go through a process. We need to lay the foundation for a good consensus based on text, which is low-cost trial and error, and rapid iteration. And then, AR/VR could be added for enhancing the immersive experience. This would be an efficient way to build our ideal metaverse.Host: Good point of view. So, what is the future vision of FindTruman?Bing:In terms of content: FindTruman is a series campaign containing many seasons. Moreover, FindTruman is our first ARG story, and more stories are coming¬†soon.From a long-term development perspective: We will abstract this content co-creation method into an open protocol, and build an open platform.All the NFT communities could present their own stories based on this platform. Just like the Snapshot, all communities can create their own polls. FindTruman‚Äôs open platform allows people from other communities to create stories that their communities want to¬†express.In fact, each community has formed a consensus internally based on its own NFT. This consensus gives the community a foundation to start with. For the subsequent construction, each community should consider how to develop, how to enrich the content, and how to add gameplay. However, developing games is too heavy, and there is no consensus on what to¬†develop.Like what FindTruman did, first through the text description, let the community members reach a narrative consensus, and then execute the development, improve the visual effects, and finally create a product. Such products can truly stand the test of the market. This is a bottom-up approach chosen by everyone. And it is also the embodiment of the blockchain spirit.Host: Very exciting idea. That‚Äôs almost all I want to ask. Finally, could you describe FindTruman in two or three sentences.Bing:Okay~FindTruman is the FIRST Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse.The content is expressed in text form and presented via Twitter. The process of content interaction is based on digital assets, and all the interactions are recorded on the blockchain. During the whole process, the footprints and rewards of each participant are written on the blockchain. All these footprints and rewards in turn affect the development of the entire¬†story.Social media¬†links:üîπ Website: https://findtruman.ioüîπ Twitter: @FindTrumanüîπ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/vrUjMWsjAjüîπ Medium: https://medium.com/@FindTruman

entry.title: FindTruman Q&A
entry.content: ‚ùì1. What is FindTruman?üî∏FindTruman is the FIRST Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse. It blurs the lines between reality and fiction by conveying a hybrid gaming experience through online-offline mechanisms. By using NFT, FindTruman builds a bridge between the real world and the virtual world.üî∏The whole story of FindTruman are shown on Twitter. The characters of FindTruman are ordinary people like us, and they post tweets every day. They are linked together by a mysterious incident. While, the mastermind of this incident is TRUMAN. The unbeknown relationships, the undisclosed secrets, are all hidden in the characters‚Äô tweets. All the players collaboratively look for clues, organize scattered information and solve puzzles to promote the plot development.üî∏What makes FindTruman special is, the players could determine the direction of the plot by NFT-based voting. By using FTG (FindTruman Genesis NFT), the players will have the supreme right to decide the others‚Äô fate. The decision will change the characters‚Äô every action. The decision may make TRUMAN give the show away. If the players find out TRUMAN, they will obtain the Genesis Prize. OR TRUMAN escapes and wins.üî∏FindTruman is a series campaign containing many seasons. Moreover, FindTruman is our first ARG story, and more stories are coming soon.From a long-term development perspective, we will abstract this content co-creation method into an open protocol, and build an open platform. üî∏FindTruman‚Äôs open platform allows people from other communities to create stories that their communities want to¬†express.‚ùì2. What‚Äôs the team of FindTruman?üî∏The Co-founder & CEO of FindTruman‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää‚Äî Will, is one of the first people to make Chinese LARP (Live Action Role Play) game, which is also a form of gaming with social content.üî∏In 2017, He created the Chinese LARP brand. He has good experience in content social gaming.üî∏Currently, he has:‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää30+ Million registered users on APP; ‚Äî 50+ live-action studios around China;‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää1500+ authors in contract;‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää20k+ story copyrights‚ùì3. Is FindTruman a one-off campaign? No! FindTruman is a series campaign, and contains many seasons. Moreover, FindTruman is our first ARG story, and more stories are coming¬†soon!‚ùì4. What is FTGÔºüWhat is the value of FTG? FTG(FindTruman Genesis NFT):üî∏ is a permanent ticket for the FindTruman series‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääparticipate in the future campaigns, voting, interaction, solving puzzles, changing others‚Äô lives‚Ä¶üî∏ is the core assets of FindTruman, it is minted on the Ethereum.üî∏ have a chance to win the Genesis Prize.üî∏ represents Truman DAO‚Äôs membership to share future governance rights.‚ùì5. What‚Äôs the total number of FTG? What‚Äôs the price? üî∏ Total: 5000 üî∏ Price:¬†0.08ETH‚ùì6. What‚Äôs the rarity mechanism of FTG? The rarity of FTG is ranked in four levels (from high to low): ORANGE(nearly 2%), PURPLE(nearly 20%), BLUE(nearly 39%) and GRAY(nearly 39%).‚ùì7. How to mint FTG?üî∏ 500 FREE MINT for VIP Players, including: early adopters, cooperative communities, etc.üî∏ 4500 PUBLIC SALES (among them, 2500 will be allocated for Whitelist minting)‚ùì8. When FTG minting will start? To be announced.‚ùì9. When does the game start? FindTruman is a series campaign containing many seasons. Currently, we are on the stage of FindTruman Alpha Test Version. The timeline:üî∏FindTruman Alpha Test Version was successfully held on Mar.18th, 19th, 20th, 2022, and was well received by public. (More details: replay-of-findtruman-alpha-test) üî∏FindTruman Season ONE and following seasons start: Q2 of¬†2022.‚ùì10. Where can view the replay of FindTruman Alpha Test? Go to: replay-of-findtruman-alpha-test.‚ùì11. Is FindTruman POAP free? Yes! Just fill in the form: https://forms.gle/sZRQ7MGNkj8fkSQ9A‚ùì12. How to get a FindTruman POAP? Fill the form: https://forms.gle/sZRQ7MGNkj8fkSQ9A‚ùì13. What are the privileges for VIP players?VIP Players are our first advocates. They are the early builders of our FindTruman community. VIP Players are qualified for FTG free¬†minting.‚ùì14. How to become the VIP Player? Three methods: üî∏ Method 1‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää‚Äî Invite friends! Create community!(Closed on Feb 28th, 2022!)üî∏ Method 2‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää‚Äî Do tasks! Open blind boxes! By completing the relevant tasks, you will get the FTG parts in Blind Boxes (draw randomly: skin, head, clothes, accessory and background). You can merge your FTG after collecting all different types. (Note: Robot skin is very rare, and is only available in Blind Boxes)(Closed on Mar 31st, 2022!)üî∏ Method 3‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää‚Äî Participate in FindTruman Alpha Test, and submit the ‚ÄúSEVEN SINS Trial Report‚Äù to win the Top-10 excellent detectives!(Closed on Mar 31st,¬†2022!)‚ùì15. What is FindTruman Detective Badge?üî∏ FindTruman Detective Badges represent the identity and honors you have received. The current badges include:- Noob Detective Badge- Pioneer Detective Badge- Good Relationship Detective Badge - Black-water Lake Case-solving Badge - SEVEN DEADLY SINS Trial Badge - Scarlet Church Case-solving BadgeMore badges are coming¬†soon‚Ä¶‚ùì16. How to get FindTruman Detective Badge? Please go to: https://findtruman.io/#/badges for more¬†details.

entry.title: Mask Network √ó FindTruman: launch the First Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse
entry.content: Mask Network will assist FindTruman to launch the first alternate reality game in Metaverse.FindTruman is an emerging alternate reality game that blurs the lines between reality and fiction by conveying a hybrid gaming experience through online-offline mechanisms. This online-offline combination improves the immersion process of participants. All participants collaboratively look for clues, organize scattered information and solve puzzles to promote the plot development that combines both real and virtual environments.Mask Network will support participants seamlessly entering into the FindTruman Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse without leaving their familiar Web 2.0 social networks. Mask Network has always been building the bridge between Web 2.0 social networks and Web 3.0 DApps. Mask Network is a strong believer in the core concepts of decentralization, openness, and greater user utility. FindTruman has the same vision with Mask Network, and all voting results of FindTruman are decentralized and traceable, and belong to the individuals completely, which truly brings a transparent and reliable internet economic environment.By installing the Mask Network extension to Twitter, participants can enter into the FindTruman Metaverse conveniently, and open a mysterious journey.Participants with encrypted assets can vote to decide the subsequent plots and finish the puzzle-solving tasks on Twitter. The plot of FindTruman is a dynamic and mutable interplay. All the participants are involved in the construction of story content. The plots and clues will be adaptively adjusted based on all participants‚Äô voting¬†results.Participants with Mask tokens can unlock additional encrypted clues, which will assist them to become advanced¬†players.Besides, with SocialFi Alliance launched by Mask Network, more possibilities of the SocialFi aspects in FindTruman will be explored. Participants can get FindTruman‚Äôs stage reward instantly after each social task, and have chance to split the prize pool. More values of story content and social interaction will be injected into NFT digital assets. Truman IP will form its unique style in the Metaverse. With the creation of Truman IP, Truman DAO will be established and Truman Space will be created in each Metaverse land. Truman will definitely become the wormhole between different Metaverses.üëÄ Follow FindTruman in these channels:üîπ Official website: https://findtruman.ioüîπ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FindTrumanüîπ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/vrUjMWsjAjüîπ Medium: https://medium.com/@FindTrumanAbout FindTrumanFindTruman campaign is characterized by the combination of virtual and reality, immersive interaction and co-creation of plot. Participants with encrypted digital assets will have the supreme right to decide the others‚Äô fates. Participants‚Äô decisions will change every action in real world, and may make the real ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù give the show away. For more details, please visit FindTruman‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäThe first Alternative Reality Game in MetaVerse.About Mask¬†NetworkMask Network is a portal that allows users to seamlessly send encrypted messages, cryptocurrencies, and even DApps (NFTs, DAO, Defi) over the top of social networks without migrating, and thereby creating a decentralized Applet (DApplet) ecosystem. In short, Mask want to bridge the New, Open Internet right on top of the current¬†one.

entry.title: FindTruman‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäThe first Alternative Reality Game in MetaVerse
entry.content: FindTruman‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäThe first Alternate Reality Game in MetaVerseA campaign called #FindTruman is spreading on Twitter. A giant axe dripping with blood, two bizarre but similar rooms, three seemingly unrelated events, more and more people are being implicated, while one of them is ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù.Get FindTruman Genesis NFT (FTG), the pass leading to the space blurring reality and fiction, you will have the supreme right to decide the others‚Äô fate. Your decision will change their every action. Your decision may make the real ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù give the show¬†away.Find out the real ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù, then obtain the Genesis Prize OR ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù escapes and¬†wins.FindTruman campaign takes the real world as platform and the virtual space as carrier. Does the virtual space invade the real world or does the real world dominate the virtual¬†space?Everything is decided by you! Now, join FindTruman at¬†once!Replay of FindTruman Alpha Test¬†!üëÄ Follow FindTruman in these channels:üîπ Official website: https://findtruman.ioüîπ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FindTrumanüîπ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/vrUjMWsjAjüîπ Medium: https://medium.com/@FindTrumanüá®üá≥ FindTruman‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää‚Äî ‰Ω†Âú®ÂÖÉÂÆáÂÆô‰∏≠ÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏ÄÂú∫ÂâßÊú¨ÊùÄ‰∏ÄÂú∫ÂêçÂè´FindTrumanÁöÑÊ¥ªÂä®Ê≠£Âú®Twitter‰∏äËîìÂª∂ÂºÄÊù•„ÄÇ‰∏ÄÊääÊª¥ÁùÄÈ≤úË°ÄÁöÑÂ∑®ÊñßÔºå‰∏§‰∏™ËØ°ÂºÇÂç¥Áõ∏‰ººÁöÑÊàøÈó¥Ôºå‰∏â‰ª∂Áúã‰ººÊØ´‰∏çÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÔºåË∂äÊù•Ë∂äÂ§öÁöÑ‰∫∫Ë¢´ÁâµËøûËøõÊù•ÔºåËÄå‚ÄúÊ•öÈó®‚ÄùÂ∞±Âú®ÂÖ∂‰∏≠„ÄÇËé∑ÂæóÊ•öÈó®Âàõ‰∏ñÁ∫™NFT (FTG)‚Äî‚ÄîÂâçÂæÄËôöÂÆû‰∫§Ëûç‰∏ñÁïåÁöÑÈÄöË°åËØÅÔºå‰Ω†Â∞ÜÊã•ÊúâÂÜ≥ÂÆö‰ªñ‰∫∫ÂëΩËøêÁöÑÊó†‰∏äÊùÉÂà©„ÄÇ‰Ω†ÁöÑÂÜ≥ÂÆöÂ∞ÜÊîπÂèò‰ªñ‰ª¨ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏æ‰∏ÄÂä®ÔºåËÆ©ÁúüÊ≠£ÁöÑ‚ÄúÊ•öÈó®‚ÄùÈú≤Âá∫È©¨ËÑö„ÄÇÊâæÂà∞ÁúüÊ≠£ÁöÑ‚ÄúÊ•öÈó®‚ÄùÔºå‰Ω†Â∞ÜËµ¢ÂæóÂàõ‰∏ñÁ∫™Â§ßÂ•ñÔºÅÂê¶ÂàôÔºå‚ÄúÊ•öÈó®‚ÄùÈÄÉËÑ±Âπ∂Ëé∑ËÉú‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Ê¥ªÂä®‰ª•Áé∞ÂÆû‰∏ñÁïå‰Ωú‰∏∫Âπ≥Âè∞ÔºåËôöÊãüÁ©∫Èó¥‰Ωú‰∏∫ËΩΩ‰ΩìÔºåÁ©∂Á´üÊòØËôöÊãüÁ©∫Èó¥‰æµÂÖ•Áé∞ÂÆû‰∏ñÁïåËøòÊòØÁé∞ÂÆû‰∏ñÁïå‰∏ªÂÆ∞ËôöÊãüÁ©∫Èó¥Ôºü‰∏ÄÂàáÈÉΩÁî±‰Ω†ÁöÑÈÄâÊã©Êù•ÂÜ≥ÂÆöÔºÅÁé∞Âú®ÔºåÂç≥ÂàªÔºåÂä†ÂÖ•ÂØªÊâæÊ•öÈó®Ê¥ªÂä®ÔºÅÂõûÈ°æFindTruman AlphaÊµãËØïÁâàÔºÅ

entry.title: Prologue of FindTruman (Alpha Test Version)
entry.content: https://medium.com/media/32aa1e431e590192ba214cdba27bc649/href‚ùó The Prologue of FindTruman is the ‚ÄúAlpha Test Version‚Äù of FindTruman Campaign.Replay of Prologue of FindTruman(Alpha Test)‚ú® FindTruman Alpha Test was successfully held from Mar.18th to 20th, 2022, and was well received by¬†public!üëâ View the replay of the story:https://twitter.com/search?q=(%23FT_Alpha_Test)%20(from%3AThomas26670%20OR%20from%3AAngelic25314540%20OR%20from%3AAxe509%20OR%20from%3AVincent10679122%20OR%20from%3AFindTruman)&src=typed_query&f=liveüòé The anchor with millions of fans make the LIVE broadcasting on FindTruman Alpha Test: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N0Te3X5N3-4&t=275sBy joining the Prologue of FindTruman, you¬†can:üî∏ Have the possibility to be in the Whitelist of FTG (FindTruman Genesis NFTs) airdrops.üî∏ To be the pioneer of the first Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse.Timeline:‚è∞ Prologue of FindTruman (Alpha Test Version): was successfully held on Mar.18th, 19th, 20th,¬†2022‚è∞ FindTruman Campaign starts: Q2 of¬†2022Follow FindTruman in these channels:üîµ Official websiteÔºöhttps://findtruman.ioüîµ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FindTrumanüîµ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/vrUjMWsjAjüîµ Medium: https://medium.com/@FindTruman

entry.title: A glimpse into FindTruman
entry.content: A glimpse into FindTruman CampaignWhat is FindTruman?FindTruman is the FIRST Alternate Reality Game in Metaverse. It blurs the lines between reality and fiction by conveying a hybrid gaming experience through online-offline mechanisms. By using NFT, FindTruman builds a bridge between the real world and the virtual¬†world.The whole story of FindTruman are shown on Twitter. The characters of FindTruman are ordinary people like us, and they post tweets every day. They are linked together by a mysterious incident. While, the mastermind of this incident is TRUMAN. The unbeknown relationships, the undisclosed secrets, are all hidden in the characters‚Äô tweets. All the players collaboratively look for clues, organize scattered information and solve puzzles to promote the plot development.What makes FindTruman special is, the players could determine the direction of the plot by NFT-based voting. By using FTG (FindTruman Genesis NFT), the players will have the supreme right to decide the others‚Äô fate. The decision will change the characters‚Äô every action. The decision may make TRUMAN give the show away. If the players find out TRUMAN, they will obtain the Genesis Prize. OR TRUMAN escapes and¬†wins.FindTruman is a series campaign containing many seasons. Moreover, FindTruman is our first ARG story, and more stories are coming¬†soon.From a long-term development perspective, we will abstract this content co-creation method into an open protocol, and build an open platform. FindTruman‚Äôs open platform allows people from other communities to create stories that their communities want to¬†express.How to join FindTruman campaign?üí∞ Step 1: Buy FindTruman Genesis NFT¬†(FTG).üëÄ Step 2: Follow the relevants‚Äô twitters.üí¨ Step 3: Discuss and share your opinions about #FindTruman campaign on¬†Twitter.üñêüèª Step 4: Participate in the votes to decide the plot development. You will decide the relevants‚Äô every action. Your choice may make the real ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù give the show¬†away.üîé Step 5: Find out the real ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù, then obtain the Genesis Prize OR ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù escapes and¬†wins.About the Genesis¬†Prize:üèÜ Genesis Prize pool: 10% of FTG¬†sales‚ùó To win the Genesis Prize, you¬†must:1Ô∏è‚É£ Step 1: Vote all the ‚ÄúCritical‚Äù questions correctly;2Ô∏è‚É£ Step 2: Submit a ‚ÄúTruman-Searching Report‚Äù, and get other FTG holders‚Äô supports.Cooperative communities:üåü Participants who have NFTs or a certain number of Tokens of the cooperative communities, can decrypt additional encrypted clues.Voting rules:üî∑ Each FTG can vote only once in each round of¬†voting;üî∑ Two types of¬†voting:The value of¬†FTGÔºö‚ú¥Ô∏è To be the lucky guy and win the Genesis¬†Prize.‚ú¥Ô∏è FTG is designed with rarity mechanism.‚ú¥Ô∏è A permanent ticket for the subsequent FindTruman series‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääparticipate in the future campaigns, share the future prize¬†pools‚Ä¶‚ú¥Ô∏èÔ∏è Represent Truman DAO‚Äôs membership to share future governance rights and benefits.Distribution of¬†FTGÔºö‚ùáÔ∏è The number of FTG is limited at¬†5000.‚ùáÔ∏è Each of them represents both unique digital collectibles on the ETH blockchain as well as Truman DAO‚Äôs membership to share future governance rights and benefits.‚ùáÔ∏è Each FTG represents a unique individual. Maybe you are the one who finds ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù finally, or the ‚ÄúTruman‚Äù that all the people are looking¬†for.FTG MintÔºöüî∫ Total number:¬†5000üî∫ Network:¬†EthereumTimelineÔºö‚è∞ Replay of FindTruman Alpha¬†Test‚è∞ FindTruman campaign starts: Q2 of¬†2022.RoadmapÔºöFollow FindTruman in these channels:üîµ Official website: https://findtruman.ioüîµ Twitter: https://twitter.com/FindTrumanüîµ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/vrUjMWsjAjüîµ Medium: https://medium.com/@FindTruman
